course_title: Special Topics: American Questions: Intro to Native American Hist.
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 5 / Seats Avail: 2Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
(Same as HIST 285 5)
This course examines the history of Native peoples in North America before 1900. The course will take an interdisciplinary approach to the past and consider themes such as resistance to colonialism, maintenance of political sovereignty, and adaptation to cultural change.
course_description:
Seminars arranged around current issues and controversies in American culture. May be repeated as topic changes.
.
sections: Class Nbr: 4741, Section #: 2, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 4-5:15p, Instructor: L. Mortimer, Status: Open
